value.string:
from Products.DCWorkflow.DCWorkflow import ValidationFailed
 from Products.ERP5Type.Message import Message
 transaction = state_change['object']
 
 currency = transaction.getResourceTitle()
 
 var_ressource_title = transaction.getResourceTitle().lower()
 var_ressource_title = var_ressource_title.replace(" ", "_")
 encaisse_devise = "/encaisse_des_devises/%s/sortante" %(var_ressource_title)
 #encaisse_devise = "/encaisse_des_devises/%s/sortante" %(transaction.getResourceTitle().lower())
 
 
 encaisse_billets_et_monnaies = "/encaisse_des_billets_et_monnaies/entrante"
 
 
 # check resource on incoming line
 doc_resource = transaction.getResource()
 for line in transaction.contentValues(portal_type="Outgoing Cash To Currency Sale Line"):
 if line.getResourceValue().getPriceCurrency() != doc_resource:
 msg = Message(domain="ui", message="Resource defined on document is different from input cash.")
 raise ValidationFailed, (msg,)
 
 counter_site = transaction.getSource()
 
 # check we don't change of user
 transaction.Baobab_checkSameUserVault(counter_site)
 
 outgoing_source = counter_site + encaisse_devise
 
 # check again that we are in the good accounting date
 transaction.Baobab_checkCounterDateOpen(site=outgoing_source, date=transaction.getStartDate())
 
 # check again that the counter is open
 
 context.Baobab_checkCounterOpened(counter_site)
 
 # use of the constraint : Test cash status line
 #vliste = transaction.checkConsistency()
 #transaction.log('vliste', vliste)
 #if len(vliste) != 0:
 # raise ValidationFailed, (vliste[0].getMessage(),)
 
 
 
 resource_one = transaction.CashDelivery_checkCounterInventory(outgoing_source,portal_type='Outgoing Cash To Currency Sale Line')
 
 
 #billetage_entre = transaction.getTotalPrice(deliveryLineType='Incoming Cash To Currency Sale Line')
 billetage_entre = transaction.getTotalPrice(portal_type=['Incoming Cash To Currency Sale Line','Cash Delivery Cell'],fast=0)
 #billetage_sorti = transaction.getTotalPrice(deliveryLineType='Outgoing Cash To Currency Sale Line')
 billetage_sorti = transaction.getTotalPrice(portal_type=['Outgoing Cash To Currency Sale Line', 'Cash Delivery Cell'],fast=0)
 
 
 base_price = transaction.getSourceTotalAssetPrice()
 quantity = transaction.getQuantity()
 
 
 if resource_one == 2:
 msg = Message(domain="ui", message="No Resource.")
 raise ValidationFailed, (msg,)
 elif billetage_entre != quantity :
 msg = Message(domain="ui", message="Received amount is different from input cash.")
 raise ValidationFailed, (msg,)
 elif billetage_sorti != base_price :
 msg = Message(domain="ui", message="Return amount is different from output cash")
 raise ValidationFailed, (msg,) 
 elif resource_one != 0 :
 msg = Message(domain="ui", message="Insufficient balance")
 raise ValidationFailed, (msg,)
